pageHeader.title: Your Digital Architect
pageHeader.description: We focus on what matters. Every element has a purpose. Our success is measured by stable websites, strong structure, and businesses that keep growing.

philosophy.title: Strategy. Structure. Scalability.
philosophy.content: At Pilar Labs, we position ourselves as Digital Architects—partners who build sustainable digital infrastructures, not temporary solutions.

story.title: Our Story
content: After years of seeing companies trapped with fragile, hard-to-develop websites, we founded Pilar Labs with one mission: to build truly solid digital infrastructures.

We reject the "move fast and break things" philosophy. We believe in "build strong, scale smart"—approaching every project like an architect designing a building, with careful planning and strong structure.
Every system we design is built with the highest engineering standards: clean code, type safety, automated testing. These aren't optional—they're the foundation of how we work.

values.title: Core Values
values.subtitle: The pillars that hold up everything we build.

commitment.title: Our Commitment
content: We believe that every business deserves world-class digital infrastructure. There's no reason to settle for half-measures.
Through Pilar Labs, we are committed to being a trusted partner for companies who want to build sustainable digital infrastructures—ready for the next 5 years of growth, not just 5 months.
commitment.quote: "Robust infrastructure enables sustainable growth. That's not just our tagline—it's our promise."

positions.title: Available Positions

frontend.description: Build modern, responsive user interfaces with React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS

backend.title: Backend Developer
backend.description: Develop scalable APIs and server-side applications with Node.js or Python

fullstack.title: Full-Stack Developer
fullstack.description: Work on both frontend and backend to build complete web applications

uiux.description: Design beautiful and user-friendly interfaces using Figma

requirements.title: Requirements
items: Active student (minimum 3rd semester) or fresh graduate
Passionate about programming and web development
Basic understanding of your desired position
Able to commit at least 20 hours/week for 3-6 months
Self-driven and eager to learn
Portfolio or previous projects (GitHub, Behance, etc.)

nurasaStore.title: Nurasa - Premium Snack Landing Page
nurasaStore.description: A modern landing page for a premium snack brand, focusing on brand storytelling and WhatsApp conversion.
nurasaStore.challenge: Building a digital presence from scratch with a limited budget and needing a fast launch to start receiving online orders.
nurasaStore.solution: A single-page landing page focusing on brand storytelling, product showcase, and WhatsApp integration for easy ordering. Warm & premium design reflecting the story in every flavor.
results: Launched in 2 weeks from concept to production
Trust badges for credibility (Quality Ingredients, Hygiene & Safety)
Clean navigation and smooth scrolling UX

yogiBusana.title: Yogi Busana - Balinese Traditional Costume Rental
yogiBusana.description: A bilingual website (English/Indonesian) for a Balinese traditional costume rental service, serving domestic and international tourists.
yogiBusana.challenge: Reaching both international and local markets with clear communication regarding traditional costume rental for religious and cultural events in Bali.
yogiBusana.solution: A website with multi-language support (EN/ID), clean design reflecting Balinese culture, and complete information regarding rental services. Focused on user experience for tourists needing traditional attire.

pageHeader.title: Privacy Policy
pageHeader.description: How we collect, use, and protect your information.

collection.title: 1. Information We Collect
collection.intro: We collect information that you provide directly to us, including:
items: Name, email address, and phone number
Company information and business details
Project requirements and preferences
Communication history and correspondence

usage.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
usage.intro: We use the information we collect to:
items: Provide, maintain, and improve our services
Process your requests and communicate with you
Send you technical notices and support messages
Respond to your inquiries and provide customer service
Analyze usage patterns and optimize user experience

sharing.title: 3. Information Sharing
sharing.intro: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share your information only in the following circumstances:
items: With your explicit consent
To comply with legal obligations
With trusted service providers who assist in our operations
To protect our rights and prevent fraud

security.title: 4. Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.

rights.title: 5. Your Rights
items: Access and receive a copy of your personal data
Request correction of inaccurate information
Request deletion of your personal data
Withdraw consent at any time
Lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority

cookies.title: 6. Cookies and Tracking
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track activity on our website and store certain information. You can instruct your browser to refuse all cookies or to indicate when a cookie is being sent.

changes.title: 7. Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.intro: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:

pageHeader.title: Terms of Service
pageHeader.description: Terms and conditions for using our services.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using the services of PT Pilar Inovasi Teknologi ("Pilar Labs"), you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and conditions of this agreement. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our services.

services.title: 2. Services Description
services.intro: Pilar Labs provides web development, digital consulting, and related technology services. Our services include but are not limited to:
items: Website development and design
Company profile creation
Landing page development
Website redesign and optimization
Technical consultation and support

obligations.title: 3. User Obligations
items: Provide accurate and complete information
Maintain the confidentiality of your account credentials
Use our services only for lawful purposes
Not interfere with or disrupt the services
Comply with all applicable laws and regulations

payment.title: 4. Payment Terms
payment.intro: All fees are quoted in Indonesian Rupiah (IDR) unless otherwise specified. Payment terms will be outlined in individual project agreements and typically include:
items: Initial deposit upon project commencement
Milestone-based payments for larger projects
Final payment upon project completion
Additional fees for scope changes or revisions beyond agreed limits

intellectual.title: 5. Intellectual Property
intellectual.intro: Upon full payment, clients receive ownership of the final deliverables. However:
items: Pilar Labs retains the right to showcase completed work in our portfolio
Pre-existing code, tools, and frameworks remain our property
Open-source components are governed by their respective licenses
We may reuse general methodologies and techniques

timeline.title: 6. Project Timeline
timeline.content: We strive to meet agreed-upon deadlines. However, timelines may be affected by: client feedback delays, scope changes, technical challenges, or force majeure events. We will communicate promptly about any timeline adjustments.

warranties.title: 7. Warranties and Disclaimers
warranties.intro: We warrant that our services will be performed with professional skill and care. However:
items: We do not guarantee specific business results or outcomes
Third-party services and integrations are provided "as is"
We are not liable for issues arising from client-provided content
Website performance depends on hosting and infrastructure choices

liability.title: 8. Limitation of Liability
liability.content: Pilar Labs' total liability for any claims arising from our services shall not exceed the total amount paid by the client for the specific project. We are not liable for indirect, incidental, or consequential damages.

support.title: 9. Support and Maintenance
support.content: Post-launch support and maintenance services are available under separate agreements. Basic technical support is typically included for a specified period after project delivery.

termination.title: 10. Termination
termination.content: Either party may terminate the agreement with written notice. Upon termination, the client is responsible for payment of all work completed up to the termination date.

governing.title: 11. Governing Law
governing.content: These terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the Republic of Indonesia. Any disputes shall be resolved in the courts of Jakarta.

changes.title: 12. Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Continued use of our services after changes constitutes acceptance of the modified terms.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.intro: For questions about these Terms of Service, please contact:
